gcci.text: H100 scarcity under export controls is reshaping capex toward domestic alternatives and multi-vendor procurement strategies to stabilize supply chain risk.

gtpi.text: At an average input price of $1.25 per 1M tokens, providers are leaning into aggressive pricing and higher context windows to win share in a model-compression race.

gagl.text: A 120 TWh annual AI load threatens grid stability and carbon budgets unless demand-side flexibility and clean baseload (e.g., nuclear) scale rapidly.

aipi.text: Adoption momentum is strong but capital efficiency is under scrutiny, elevating the risk of a bubble unless revenue models demonstrate clear, sustainable ROI.
